00014 // Network class definition
00015 // to handle a collection groups of neurons, create them from a configuration file, the outputs, etc.
00017 
00018 
00019 class Network
00020 {
00021 public:
00022     Network() {}
00023     ~Network();
00024     void build_from_file(std::string filename, std::string logfilename = "log.dat", bool no_output = false);
00025     void update();
00026     void clear_past_of_spike_list(const Time & time_end_past);
00027 protected:
00028     typedef std::list<boost::shared_ptr<Group> > ListGroupType;
00029     typedef std::list<boost::shared_ptr<ConfigBase> > ListConfigType;
00030     ListGroupType gp_list_; // list of pointers to the neurons of the network
00031     ListConfigType cfg_list_; // list of pointers to the configurators for the connections to keep
00032 
00033 };
00034 
00035 
00037 // Network inline definitions
00039 
00041 // Update method
00042 // all the groups are updates from #0 to last one
00043 inline void Network::update()
00044 {
00045     for (ListGroupType::const_iterator i = gp_list_.begin();
00046             i != gp_list_.end();
00047             ++i)
00048         (*i)->update();
00049 }
00050 
00052 // clean the spike list of the neurons up to 'time_end_past'
00053 inline void Network::clear_past_of_spike_list(const Time & time_end_past)
00054 {
00055     for (ListGroupType::const_iterator i = gp_list_.begin(); i != gp_list_.end(); ++i)
00056         (*i)->clear_past_of_spike_list(time_end_past);
00057 }

00059 
00060 #endif // !defined(NETWORK_H)
